Wolverine was great!  I've seen the previews for this game, and it looks decent...  I believe mattvoid is wrong... the game was made in conjunction with the movie. The "xmen: origins" idea was thrown around well before the game was developed. Sega DID make the iron man games unfortunately, as well... so i dunno. i'm gonna wait and see...

Yea...game is complete shit.  Dull, uninspired, and bland.  Not worth the disc.

IMO Iron Man was the only decent marvel title sega has done so far, and even the 2nd was like they took a dump on the license.  You would think "hey, this is Thor, it's a brawler...how bad could it be?"...well...find out, just dont say I didnt warn you

Guys, my Xbox 360 is already modded. I just want to know that after I download this game, will I just burn it then it can be played on my console?
Yes, if you flashed your Xbox, use abgx to make the .dvd file (I always make one even if it comes with one) and then burn it using IMGburn. Once you finish you pop in the disk and you're done!
